Enum Class Region

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Region>
com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.resource.Region
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Region>, Constable
public enum Region extends Enum<Region>
A geographical region that contains one or more datacenters.
